ygData.subject: Soloing a chanter
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Guys I ve got a level 31 chanter (that s taken me three years to get to 31 - I remember when everquest was a 2 d game, and all the characters looked really
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Guys

I've got a level 31 chanter (that's taken me three years to get to
31 - I remember when everquest was a 2 d game, and all the
characters looked really 'flat'... and the elementals looked like
rocks with arms!)

However due to my time differences to the rest of the world (ie. the
US) i rarely get the option to group.

So my only option is to solo -- I've been soloing my lower level
characters ok, but am finding the chanter a tad more difficult.

Sooooooooo....

a) does anyone have advice about techniques that they've used that
worked soloing an enchanter

and

b) can anyone please suggest a zone that would be good?

Many thanks in advance

T.
